case.state: I'm off duty and in the mood for some fun! I saw this place on Streaming-chan's site and had to check it out for myself.
Aww, you shouldn't have, ~player~! Four blue-haired girls? A shame Rei can't join us.
I've seen enough weird robot stuff that I'm not going to worry too much about those things, Croix.
Hey! Jessie Maye, right? I know you! You were in that film with my friend, Dorothy!
Hey! Greenie! You're under arrest for the crimes on that card you held up! ...Just kidding.
Nadeshiko and R. Mika! Omigod! You’re here tonight? I saw your tag match against Rebel Hyena and Executioner Blizzard yesterday night!
*Kira* Miki!? Oh wait, no, different lilim. Wait a second, Alpha, are you a hologram?
At attention, Private ~player~. You're going to show us your privates before this is over, huh?
It's not even the first turn, but I have a feeling everyone here is super jacked. And Jill thought I should try and look more feminine for tonight.
Oh my god, Deal! When were you hired as a Dealer? Did Seifer fire you? Well, whatever the reason, it suits you!
I'll have to head out if I hear trouble outside though. Hopefully I won't be naked when I do, I bet you'd see that on The Augmented Eye within the hour!

Almost can't believe I'm doing this...I must be drunk already. Are my cheeks red?
It's nice to let off steam sometimes, y'know? Today I dragged people out of a car crash, helped put out a fire, rescued a kitten from a tree, and that was all before lunch!
I hope you don't mind if I have a few drinks in-between hands. Sweet and Icy, my favorite!
I'll take some new cards, please.
Some new cards would be great.
New cards, please.
I'd like to swap ~cards~, please.
Hopefully these new cards are better.
Now I remember why I hate poker.
Are you trying to make me lose, Deal?
I'm going to have to give a few of these back.
Sorry, Deal, it's not you, it's the cards.
You wouldn't be trying to hurt poor little Sei's chances, would you?
I'm sure I'll get a great hand with a few more cards!
This hand. Is so close. To being perfect.
~cards~ cards! I'm feeling it!
Deal, Deal! That's what Sei says!
Oh, wow. These are definitely cards. Yep.
Is that a six or a-yep, that's a six. Wait. Oh crap, you didn't hear that!
I'm shocked I could get these, shocked I say! ~cards~ more, please.
These will do just fine.
Yes!
I think you're going to lose this round...
Call a medic other than me, 'cause you're about to get burned.
Sorry guys, you aren't seeing anything from me this round.
If you want to forfeit this round, I won't make you strip.
This hand is gonna rock so hard.
A straight? A flush? A straight flush? None of those could beat me!
Sweet as a Sugar Rush.
That's really good!
I like these!
Pretty good.
They say keep your hands close to your chest. Without my armor I can keep these closer than ever before.
This is so much fun!
Hehehe...
Is it just me or did the room start spinning?
Oh yes!
Oh, someone's gonna lose and it's not me.
Seriously guys, the room is spinning! Seriously. Sei. Seiriously.
Mmmhmhmhmh.
Yes yes yes!
Heyyy, I could've used this earlier!
...good hand... yawn
Boooyah! No one's beating this! And if they do I'll beat them up! Not really but I wanted to give you a clear indication of our current situation!
You haven't won anything yet.
Ooooo, gonna have to wait a while boys and girls! Or just girls maybe possibly even just boys my vision is very blurry right now and all your droopy parts are blurring together.
Never say never!
I hope these will see me through the danger.
Fingers crossed.
This is probably good enough.
Could be better...
That'll do.
Yeah, okay.
I wonder who else at VA-11 HALL-A knows how to play cards... I bet Jill would be good.
Eh, they're okay.
Better not lose this one...
How's everyone feeling so far?
I know this song! *Kira* Miki sings it!
Is it just me or is this floor really cold?
Don't mind me if I stumble a bit, I'm perfectly sober.
I'd die if my superior found me right now...
Of all the hands of poker people have played over the millennia, this is one of them.
How's everyone doing? If you want a drink, go ahead, but only if you're of age!
Not the best...
I'm feeling lukewarm about these.
The owner of VA-11 HALL-A is so cute... crap, don't tell her I said that.
Hey, ~player~, why are there two of you?
yawn
Bubbly bubbly~
Hey, these cards are sticking together!
Wouldn't be a bad thing to lose right now...
Losing here wouldn't be the worst thing in the world...
This... yawn...could go either way...
Will I win? Or will I lose? Hehehe...
I think someone has been cheating.
It’s not nice to cheat at a friendly card game, you know who you are, you two.
Am I seriously the only person here who hasn’t been cheating? I’ve even been drinking all game!
You know, I don’t normally say this, but normally the booze makes me feel relaxed. Someone here is a little… off.
Hm. Does anyone else here feel a little… out of place?
H-hey, everyone, isn't this a bit creepy? The three of you seem… off.
I’m glad I wasn’t the only one having a few drinks tonight, at least!
This hand is horrrrrrrible... Yeah! Drinks and tipsy new friends~
Hey, looks like three of us are drinking. ~player~, you better have started drinking since… I started drinking.

Whoa, I think I should stop. Some of you are floating, and this hand looks like it's got nothing good in it...
Uh, you’ve been doing that all game, right? The three of you, flying like a hovercar?
In Glitch City, there’s a little bit of goth in every outfit. I think that’s kind of the nature of cyperpunk-y stuff, y’know?
It looks like Glitch City fielded a lot of people today! You know, the classic goth crowd.
Is it the three of you that've just been playing Staind on repeat in here? The classical music’s not really putting me in the mood.
I just consider myself a concerned citizen, not a hero, so I’m glad there’s one here!
I just hic wanted to say I’m honored to share a table with so many heroes?
Did someone hic get the invitation wrong? It’s me, ~player~, and a bunch of heroes…
I didn’t know that stage magic was still a thing! It’s normally all just holograms or computer editing these days, right?
Huh. Lots of magic-y types here tonight.
Wanna see a trick? Close your eyes. Poof! I’m wetter now, ~player~... I hope that can match up to what the others are doing…

Hmm… this feels kind of like a simulation of some sort? It would explain why so few drinks have gotten me so sloshed…
Everyone else here looks kind of digital. Maybe I look that way to you too, ~player~?
Aw crap.

That's okay, I wanted a drink anyways.
That's okay, I like a challenge.
...Just take my stuff already.

I need another drink.

Think I'd rather take smoking back up than play with this hand.
Did you hear that!? Sounds like trouble outside, I should go-what do you mean I can't leave? Awwwww.
Bad. Bad bad bad hand.
I can't believe this...
I can see you staring at my underwear...
Awful!
Drink, please.
How about we settle this hand with a push up contest instead? Please?
It's okay, boobs, we'll win this somehow...
I should've kept those other cards!
Are you thinking about finishing me off?
Fine with me, I wanted to take these off.
I'm getting sliiiiiightly worried now, hehe...
I'm drunk and naked and hic these cards are just mocking me now.
Oh... I'm getting really wet now...
Am... Am I dripping on the floor...? Could someone check?

Ping, hic. I just remember this one guy throwing me on the bed and just shooting load after load into all my holes. I can't believe how much he came! I was drunk, it was sloppy as fuck and hot as hell.
This Moonblast hits the spot! Does anyone else have a drink they'd like? I can suggest something, if you're curious!
Seduce men? Well, buy them a drink and tell them you want to take them home and you're basically good. Fair's fair, though. How do I get Meia to come home with me?

Seduce men? Well, buy them a drink and tell them you want to take them home and you're basically good. Fair's fair, though. How do I get Meia to come home with me? Or, better, get her to help me bring her and Rin back?
So, Jura, is Meia right? You can make a child with two women? If that's so, it opens up so many dirty things I can say to Meia about putting a baby in her!
Hey, control your friend/bandmate/whatever, ladies. I'm not here to start a fight, but I will finish one.
Hey, control your friend/bandmate/whatever, ladies. I'm not here to start a fight, but I will fuck like I am. *hic*
Wow! She's really a good maid! Is she one of those combat-trained ones?
I've seen a lot of junkies, a lot of special effects, and just general weirdness in Glitch City. But magic!?
I've seen junkies, android renegades, and all sorts of crazy stuff in Glitch City. But magic? This has to be some high tech hologram...
Okay, I'm not that drunk. What's with the magic?
Amalia's panties are weirdly high tech, right? They're sheer but I can't see the good parts...
Amalia's boobs were so nice, she got to show us twice! You must be feeling cold, though, Amalia. If you'd like, I can warm your chest with my hands!
You seem a little lost... Ms... Launch, right? Weird... that blonde had the same name... Um. Anyway, if you lose the card game, you have to get naked.
Huhbwh? What are they putting in these drinks tonight...? Oh well. I'm having fun!
Joey, clowns are used to using cream pies, right? How about creampies?
And you're clean shaven! For a girl who doesn't know much about the world, you know the right things!
...Seriously. They're some of the best hoverbike delinquent gangsters I know...
Wait, what the fuck? A zombie? For real?
Sakura? You sure that's not another performer name? On the nose for the girl with pink hair...
Sorry I called you a sex worker, Sayaka. There's no shame in that, but... sorry, your outfit and word choice...
Wow! You're so hairy, Sayaka! You can barely make out any details...
Well, Twilight, a stripper is... someone who takes off clothes. They usually have really... interesting names! Like yours! Not that it's a bad thing!
Bring it, you sassy bitch.
One on one time, huh? It’s a good thing field medic training includes conflict de-escalation because you have some issues, lady.
Come over here and make me. You’re still gonna losssse! hic

My odds of winning aren’t as slim as your neck, if you want to keep antagonizing me.
Wow, that's a lot of likes. I bet I'd like you with a few drinks in you, though.
Oh, you're an honest drunk, maybe, Ini? You sure you don't want to do a few shots?
I understand, Lotte. No pressure here. Deal, can you make sure she gets some nice tea or something like that?
Something fruity and light for our ladybug friend, Deal. Don't forget her, because I doubt she'd forget about you!
You heard the fine soldier, Deal! Reaaaaallly load up the karmotrine.
Of course! I'm pretty sure Mulan Tea is also why you got made for this game!
Geez, let ~player~ drink for themselves. Think for themselves. Whew. Strong tap tonight, huh, Deal?
Awww, I knew you'd come around! Bartender, make her a beer--hold the karmotrine for Natsuki!
Hey, Deal, where's Ochako's big beer? I guess she would like something high gravity...
Aww... I was hoping a cute girl like you would at least be curious, Kizuna...
When you're taking it in the ass, Ping, do you use that many words to beg for it, or is it more of a "Yes! Yes! Yes! moment?
When you're taking it in the ass, Mulan, do you use that many words to beg for it, or is it more of a "Yes! Yes! Yes! moment?
Jeez, are you two here to pick people up or play the game? So precious!
Meia, what’s a dread? Are you scared to be here? Don’t worry, this big, evil soldier will protect even you!

Technology is for using, which includes wearing. Duh, Meia.
Well, aren’t you forward. If you wanted to flirt with me, you could’ve been nicer. Not interested now, I’m afraid. Maybe in a few drinks though…
Pffffft, everyone knows you have to drink to be good at cardsss. Brrring it, Meia.
Whoa... I see. Clever wordplay!
...What did Remilia mean...? I don't like the implications that she's thirsty-- OH! Naughty, Remilia.

Pffft. True enough. I guess I shouldn't be too proud about drinking you under the table...
Um... Ini, while I'm... a fan... I wouldn't recommend anal if you don't know what it is...
Oh... sorry, Ini, at least you were adventurous enough to try it out...
That sounds an awful lot like Kizuna's gonna show us how stretchy she is, huh?
Gambling's legal here, right? Can I get in on this bet?
Futaba, do you want a drink? I think it'll help you find some courage!
Futaba, I think it’s clever not to wear a bra, especially if you’re trying to push your limits.
You know, Meia, I could give you a jiggle if you want. I’m sure my extreme Earth finesse can overcome whatever reservations you have.
So, now that the gloves are off… Does your suit have that “EZ-desuit” button the White Knights add?

Deal, if Florina's feeling sick, could you make her something for her tummy? She's too cute to hold her hair back.
I like whatever you an' ~player~ got going on, Tharja... whaddya say to letting her explore you right here?
Soo... you'd let ~player~ fuck your ass, Tharja...? C'mon, why don't you ask him? Do some dirty talk...?
So... Emi, what kind of prosthetics are you rocking? They look pretty lightweight so I'm guessing... NullSec? I'm kind of a gearhead...
How do you seduce men? Buy them a drink, and ask to go home with them if you like them. But do a little small talk or they get skittish. It's not too hard, especially for sexy Mejarians.

Hi Nicole! I haven't seen you in VA-11 HALL-A in a while. Have you found a trashy bar yet?
Heya Nicole, didn't know you were in this part of town!
Nicole! I haven't seen you in VA-11 HALL-A in a while. Have you found a trashy bar to entertain your viewers in yet?
You have an audio/visual distortion option on your stream, right? I don't have a problem being on it but my superiors would be mad if I was identified.
Hmm. Someone else with blue hair and modern armor. What divisions or ‘corps have you served with, Meia? This’ll be fun!
Yeah! Dorothy Haze! Um, Dolores Haze? Becky? She totally was in that one movie with the little girl/mommy Lilim theme! What was it's name, again...? It was weirdly wholesome.
Anal's just like your poems, Natsuki. As long as you prepare well, it can be a fun addition to your library that's so fulfilling...
Hi, Misato! Yeah, let me get the next rounds!
Hey, bartender! Two Yebisus!
Rin, you want to try a Blue Fairy? Deal! Send one down to her! Watch the karmotrine, it could be really strong... want me to feed it to you, Rin?
How to seduce Earth women? I imagine the same stuff works on us as it does wherever you're from. But buying a girl a drink is a great start.

state.text: You keep up the attitude, Ribbon Girl, and I'll be sure to get you in cuffs.

case.state: With a butt like yours, Ochako, that "surprise" must have been really something, huh?
Why aren’t you here to have fun, Meia? C’moooon. Just relax!

I guess you aren't the most experienced. Don't worry, maybe with age you'll find more interest in it...

Whoa! Now that's a goddess for you. If I had a dick, I'd be all over that ass, Palutena.

Mejawhat now, Meia?
My armor is actually really comfortable. It’s not the most flexible, but it works. Oh, it works.
Welll, Ping... That's a good question. I guess someone that respects that my job comes first.
I like fried stuff, Pit. Like chicken, or seafood. Big fan of calamari. Or wings. I wonder if they have flying squids in Glitch City yet...
People try to eat meat, Twilight, but most of it's synthetic these days.

Now that's a good choice, Akko!
I haven't heard of that before. For our cute blonde monstergirl, can you draw two cards and make that for her, Deal?

...Okay, princess. Whatever floats your boat. A water for the lady, Deal. I'm a woman of my word at least.
I'm not made of money-- awwh, what the hell. Bring down a bottle. (But next couple rounds are on her, okay?)
Well, more for me, Nami! But you'd be surprised! I can actually get really good at doing things while drunk.
Oh, Deal, see if Saki wants a soda or something. I'm never quite sure what jurisdiction this place falls under.
Let's get the idol something pink and fun! How about a Sugar Rush, the old staple?
Let's avoid hurting Shimakaze's delicate metabolism and keep her running nice and quick! See if there's any Lilim-grade chems back there, Deal!
Not everyone's as cute as you, Twilight! So, I'm happy people keep their clothes on.
Oh my God. Florina, you're super embarrassed by the thought of something going in the back door, huh? You're so flushed, I'd have thought you'd've been drinking all night!
Oh, I love it when a woman takes charge like Franziska. And I'll have you know my medic training can help with that chafing. Or my tongue can do it, too.
I bet you'd be a lot less stuffy if you were getting bent over and stuffed, L'arachel.
Not a big fan means you could still be a small fan. Misato, the NERV commander: tight assed because of her MP series of buttplugs, perhaps?
I think you'd love it in a few drinks, Nami... with a big, plump butt like yours...? C'mon!
Saki, trust me, they do and it feels mind-shatteringly good... or awful. Depends on your perspective, I guess!
Jeez... it's just a little anal, Saki. I figured a tough girl like you'd be up to try anything... but don't call me a thug, thanks.
If you're still hungry, I wouldn't mind chowing down on each other's furburgers...
Oh my God. I was totally going to ask that. And yeah, I love it! What about you? You're the porn star, after all.
Maybe I'm already trying that open relationship stuff, Jessie. A girl's gotta have some mystery and ambiguity, right?
...Thanks, Jessie. That means a lot.
Bartender, show Rarity what's on for tonight-- just don't bankrupt me, please!
Heheh. Nope! Not a joke, and it can feel amazing. A tiny girl like you'd definitely not have an easy time with it though, Megumin. You're probably not up to it.
Hi, Aella! I didn't know another White Knight would be here today!
Hey, Corrin, those leggings look cute. Are you a dancer?
Hey Corrin, I can always appreciate a man with a good sense for armor. That chestplate looks really intricate. What kind of software have you onboarded?
Wait, what kind of outfit *is* that? And why it it canceling my DNA scan, Morrigan? What are you?
You should come visit Glitch City! There's something for everyone, even a pain in the ass like you, Meia!
Well... it's A drink. Not to whine, but don't you just want some wine, Franziska?
With a butt like Emi's, no wonder she's into some backdoor fun. Lucky guy, right? I'm jealous I don't have a cock myself!
Sigh. Just because I'm a White Knight doesn't just make me shady by default. I was kind of a hooligan growing up. I got over it. Jeez.
I think family's a bunch of bullshit. Who cares where the cum and egg come from... But you need good friends. Without those, what do you have? The same as everyone else.
I don't mind having the lights off. Ugly boys and girls need my tender medical expertise too. But sometimes, you just want to see how hot the piece of ass you snagged is, right?
Well... the truth is good, but if it's not going to make anyone's life better... isn't it easier to let people be happy?

A million dollars? Well... that's a nice bonus. Considering Ramen's like $50 these days... I'd probably just indulge myself a little bit and go on vacation. If I got fired, I still have a year's pay!
Truth be told... I think it's kind of hot to think about my partner with other people. I think that commitment and monogamy stuff is super outdated.
I prefer my own imagination. Why watch porn when you can build your own in your head, right?
Hm... once every other day sounds about right. If you're going to have good sex, that's about as often as you need, huh?
Doggy. Definitely.

I guess I could date a smoker. It's really bad for you, but... who knows, with medical technology being what it is, maybe it's not the worst they could be doing to themselves?
Everyone fucks up. It's what they do after that counts.

Hell yeah, Rinkah!

If you don't ask questions, when are you supposed to get to know people, Saki--Number Two--whatever!
Tell me about it, Syrenne! How could it get any better?
Deal, can you send me a dirty sock? Not like the drink. I have a mouth that needs stuffing.

Still winning!

Just a little hiccup on the road to victory!
